name.description: name must starts with P2A for functional request channel!

start.description: can be NULL if not used

stop.description: can be NULL if not used

result.description: can be NULL if not used

write.description: can be NULL if not used

read.description: can be NULL if not used

Driver.description: Counter used to drive this Alarm

is_group.description: the DTC is a group of events that combined

address.description: the start address of the flash bank

size.description: the size of the flash bank

repeat.description: how many this kind of banks continuously

name.description: name end with '{}' means repeatable array
name end with '{}' means repeatable array

dbc.description: the path to a Vector CAN DBC file

NumHth.description: depends on the CanAc implementation, generally 1

items.title: Pdu
items.description: the PDU ignored in the DBC file

ldf.description: the path to a LDF file

dbc.description: the path to a Vector CAN DBC file

items.title: Pdu
items.description: the PDU ignored in the DBC file

UseTxConfirmation.description: enable to use Tx comfirmation or not

N_As.description: Time for transmission of the CAN frame (any N-PDU) on the sender side

N_Bs.description: Time until reception of the next flow control N-PDU

N_Cr.description: Time until reception of the next consecutive frame N-PDU

STmin.description: Sets the duration of the minimum time the CanTp sender shall wait between the transmissions of two CF N-PDUs

BS.description: a number BS (Block Size) of consecutive frames

WftMax.description: how many Flow Control wait N-PDUs can be consecutively transmitted by the receiver

N_TA.description: target address if addressing format is CANTP_EXTENDED

dbc.description: the path to a Vector CAN DBC file

ldf.description: the path to a LDF file

items.title: Pdu
items.description: the PDU only to be trigger transmit

dyn.description: is this a dynamic length signal, and dynamic signal must be the last signal of the message

InitialValue.description: example: '0' for basic type, '[0, 1, 2]' for array

TimeoutSubstitutionValue.description: example: '0' for basic type, '[0, 1, 2]' for array
